title: Ep. #11 | ATEEZ, SOMI, and URBAN ZAKAPA + Reacting to Fan Comments
description:
In this week’s episode, Eric dives into ATEEZ’s “WAVE” and “ILLUSION”, SOMI’s “BIRTHDAY”, and URBAN ZAKAPA’S “Seoul Night”. Eric also discusses the expectations and challenges of touring internationally and reads some of YOUR comments and reviews. If you enjoy this podcast, make sure to subscribe (IT IS FREE) and leave us a comment and rating on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, SoundCloud, and YouTube.    Connect with us on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook @daebakshow. Join our exclusive mailing list at www.daebakshow.com and be the first to know about new episodes, giveaways, special events, and other random things we have planned for you guys!
 
 See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
